public final class Dictionary
extends java.lang.Object

A container for a word list.

public long save(java.lang.String filename)
          throws java.io.IOException
Save this dictionary to a compressed file.

Parameters:

Returns:
the size in bytes that was needed.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

save

public void save(java.io.OutputStream stream)
          throws java.io.IOException
Save this dictionary to the OutputStream. The data will be compressed. After finish the OutputStream is closed.

Parameters:
stream - the OutputStream
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

add

public void add(java.lang.String word)
Add a word to the tree. If it already exist then it has no effect.

Parameters:
word - the new word.

toArray

public char[] toArray()
Convert the directory tree to char array.

Returns:
a char array that include the data of the dictionary.

getDataSize

public int getDataSize()
Get the size of chars that this dictionary need in memory.

exist

public boolean exist(java.lang.String word)
Check if the word exist in this dictinary.

Parameters:
word - the word to check. Can't be null.
Returns:
true if the word exist.

suggestions

public java.util.List suggestions(java.lang.String word)
Returns a list of suggestions if the word is not in the dictionary.

Parameters:
word - the wrong spelled word. Can't be null.
Returns:
a list of class Suggestion.
